nodes.text: The New Republic Diplomatic Corps was a branch of the New Republic government devoted to diplomacy, and the peaceful settling of problems, both between New Republic members and between the New Republic and outside entities. It was active in the aftermath of the Eye of Palpatine crisis and during the Caamas Document Crisis, the latter of which saw its resources unable to cope with the massive influx of complaints.
It was stationed at the Central Administration Building on Coruscant.
